import {includes} from "lodash";
import { cx } from "emotion";
import React from "react";
 
import {Icon} from "./icon";
import {IconClose, IconCheckCircle, IconFlag, IconInfoCircle,IconExclamationTriangle} from "./icons";
 
import PropTypes from "../utils/prop-types-extra";
import mergeProps from "../utils/merge-props";
 
import getMessageStyle from "../styles/message/message.style";
import getContentStyle from "../styles/message/message-content.style";
import getDismissStyle from "../styles/message/message-close-icon.style";
import getIconStyle from "../styles/message/message-icon.style";
import getHeaderStyle from "../styles/message/message-header.style";
 
 
const sizes = ["mini","tiny","small","medium","large","big","huge","massive"];
 
export class Message extends React.Component {
 
  constructor() {
    super();
    this.state = {hidden: false};
  }
 
  dismiss = (e)=>{
    e.preventDefault();
    const {willDismiss,didDismiss} = this.props;
 
    Eif (!willDismiss || willDismiss(e) !== false) {
      this.setState({hidden: true});
      Iif (didDismiss) {
        setTimeout(didDismiss.bind(e),0);
      }
    }
  }
 
  render() {
 
    if (this.state.hidden) {
      return false;
    }
 
    const {
      attached,
      attachedTop,
      attachedBottom,
      compact,
      floating,
      dismissable,
      heading,
      icon,
      size: _size,
      variation,
      vAlign,
      children,
      headerComponent,
      willDismiss,
      didDismiss,
      ...otherProps
    } = this.props;
 
    const size = includes(sizes,_size) ? _size : "medium";
 
    const styleFlags = {
      attached,
      attachedTop,
      attachedBottom,
      compact,
      withIcon: !!icon,
      withHeader: !!heading,
      floating,
      alignTop: vAlign === "top",
      alignBottom: vAlign === "bottom",
    };
 
    let iconContent;
    let headerContent;
    let dismissContent;
    let content = children;
 
    if (heading) {
      headerContent = React.createElement(headerComponent,{
        key: "header",
        className: cx("cm-message-header",getHeaderStyle(styleFlags,variation,size)),
      },heading);
      content = [headerContent,content];
    }
 
    if (dismissable) {
      const dismissClass = cx("cm-message-dismiss",getDismissStyle(styleFlags,variation,size));
      /* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/anchor-has-content,jsx-a11y/href-no-hash,jsx-a11y/anchor-is-valid */
      dismissContent = (
        <a href="#" key="dismiss" className={dismissClass} onClick={this.dismiss}>
          <i aria-hidden="true">
            <Icon icon={IconClose} />
          </i>
        </a>
      );
      /* eslint-enable jsx-a11y/anchor-has-content,jsx-a11y/href-no-hash,jsx-a11y/anchor-is-valid */
 
      content = [dismissContent,content];
    }
 
    if (icon) {
      iconContent = (
        <i aria-hidden="true" className={cx("cm-message-icon",getIconStyle(styleFlags,variation,size))}>
          <Icon icon={icon} />
        </i>
      );
 
      content = (
        <div className={cx("cm-message-content",getContentStyle(styleFlags,variation,size))}>
          {content}
        </div>
      );
    }
    
 
    const newProps = mergeProps({
      className: cx("cm-message",getMessageStyle(styleFlags,variation,size)),
    },otherProps);
 
 
    return (
      <div {...newProps}>
        {iconContent}
        {content}
      </div>
    );
  }
}
 
Message.propTypes = {
  willDismiss: PropTypes.func,
  didDismiss: PropTypes.func,
  headerComponent: PropTypes.component,
};
 
Message.defaultProps = {
  headerComponent: "div",
};
 
export function WarningMessage(props) {
  return <Message variation="warning" icon={IconExclamationTriangle} {...props} />;
}
 
export function InfoMessage(props) {
  return <Message variation="info" icon={IconInfoCircle} {...props} />;
}
 
export function ErrorMessage(props) {
  return <Message variation="negative" icon={IconFlag} {...props} />;
}
 
export function SuccessMessage(props) {
  return <Message variation="positive" icon={IconCheckCircle} {...props} />;
}
